definitions.definition: A plant of the Brassicaceae family , Raphanus sativus or Raphanus raphanistrum subsp. sativus , having an edible root .
The root of this plant used as food . Some varieties are pungent and usually eaten raw in salads , etc., while others have a milder taste and are cooked .
Some other root plant of genus Raphanus or family Brassicaceae .
examples: rat-tail radish ( Raphanus caudatus ); wild radish ( Raphanus raphanistrum )

main_definition: A plant of the Brassicaceae family , Raphanus sativus or Raphanus raphanistrum subsp. sativus , having an edible root .
secondary_definitions: The root of this plant used as food . Some varieties are pungent and usually eaten raw in salads , etc., while others have a milder taste and are cooked .
( in combination ) Some other root plant of genus Raphanus or family Brassicaceae .
